title: Screen flashing red? Game ends suddenly?
body:
Screen just started flashing red, and our game just ended with my team in a victory. We were barely 20 minutes in, and the other team says they didn't surrender anything. I believe them because they had literally just won a teamfight(despite my team being ahead).

It wasn't a draw, I'm still in post-game lobby and it shows victory for my team.

replies.body:
Did this ever happen again afterward?

Did you capture a screenshot of the lobby?

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=j35n0MKk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-14T03:33:29.231+0000)
>
> Did this ever happen again afterward?
> 
> Did you capture a screenshot of the lobby?

it didn't happen again afterwards(or since), but everyone in the match was "wtf"ing in post-game lobby about it. The enemy hadn't surrendered, but my team apparently won?

I wouldn't not believe you, considering exactly how the server handles games. Maybe it was a freak accident were the data from a completed game leaked into your one.

Anyway, seems like a one-off thing, and the likelihood of it ever happening again, and to you, is nearly impossible.
The same thing just happened to me and another guy in my game.
